name: OpenStunt Beta
description:
Open Stunt is an open world, free style Stunt Game that has console-like physics where you walk around and drive a variety of vehicles. You can destroy environmental elements such as buildings, signs, etc. All cars are are destructible as well. In this present early access version there is a huge mountain to climb and several Ramps to jump off from. There is also a secret car to be found!

If you have found the secret car, share the photo with us at our discord server!
Also Make sure to join our discord server to get latest information about the game. Share your opinions and suggestions with us via writing review here or in our Discord channel. Discord link is:

https://discord.gg/VqPx9x2

Privacy Policy is located at:
https://ehsanngp.github.io/lightondevs/
